result.title: Bug of contest registeration (Just for fun)
result.content:
Hi.
When you want to register in a div2 contest it says your rating should be between 0 to 1699.
We all remember the time that worse rating was -52! But he registered for next contest even when his rating wasn't between 0 to 1699! :D


You can't participate in any other contests when your rating goes under 0 :D
